item.title: Example Title
item.description: ** Brigantia, goddess of mankind, elves, and the twin moons A woman with half soft human features and half sharp elven features.

item.title: Example Title
item.description: God of water, the sea, sea creatures, wind, journeymen and traders, as well as death and the afterlife Depicted as a skeletal merfolk Symbol: Seashell Holiday: Low Tidings

item.title: Example Title
item.description: The Predator is a extraplanar eldritch horror, capable of swallowing entire universes whole into his “body” The entity was the original target for the summoning ritual, but the ritual wasn’t powerful enough to reach the entity itself, and was only able to reach the plane right above it: Earth.

item.title: Example Title
item.description: Krill is the local Hunter’s Guild Magistrate, with the rank of Greater Hunter with the

item.title: Example Title
item.description: Natal is a elderly pink, shark merfolk with green and white robes, with a emerald green staff and an adorned tail.

item.title: Example Title
item.description: An adventuring party of True Hunters from [[The Hunter’s Lodge]] branch in Roslair, they were sent to investigate rumors of a plot to summon seawraiths to the village of Lhora, only to be tricked and sacrificed by the Cult of [[The Predator]].

item.title: Example Title
item.description: [[Priestess Natal]]’s Grandson, Zigg is a local merkid and pickpocket with a huge appetite. Zigg’s dream is to grow up to be a hunter like his father,
